action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Joel,
We need the system to recognise that if a customer has a bond in their quote, that if they choose Advantage Pay Later as the payment option, that Step 2 of the booking also includes a step to capture the credit card details for the bond. The amount will always be $1,000. (ie It isn't the styling fee plus the 1,000 refundable bond). If there is no bond in the quote and they choose Advanatge Pay Later, the credit card details below would not appear.
I have drafted up below how we'd like it to look







As the property is Occupied, a refundable bond is required.
The bond cannot be included in the amount loaned through our credit provider Elevare.
Please complete the credit card details below. Your card will not be charged but held as security for the bond.




Kind Regards,

David McLean

General Manager

Advantage Property Styling

Follow us on:



P 02 9310 1611 | M 0410 567 287

Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street, BANKSMEADOW NSW 2019

www.advantagestyling.com.au
